resources.string:
From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices. 

This is because Bluetooth LE beacons may be used to determine the phone's and user's location. This app will not use this information in any way. 

This is a requirement by the Android operating system and we can not change anything about this.
The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable it.
1. Make sure the hand is turned on and the battery is not empty. \n\n2. Place your smartphone as close to the hand as possible.

3. Location is turned off. Some Android phones require it enabled in order to scan for Bluetooth LE devices. If you are sure your hand is online and in range and it doesn\'t show up here, click the button below to enable Location.
You can see your favorite presets here. To define which ones you like most, star them in the Presets section.
The device you selected does not seem to be a hand device by Haifa3d.
This is not a Haifa 3D device
Tap to reset presets to factory defaults
Tap to reset configuration to factory defaults
Developed by Georg Jung, Shunit Polinsky and Miki Mendelson-Mints

The attached notices are provided for information only.
 
 -------------
 
 License notice for FontAwesome
 
 Font Awesome Free by @fontawesome - https://fontawesome.com
 License - https://fontawesome.com/license/free
 Icons: CC BY 4.0, Fonts: SIL OFL 1.1, Code: MIT License
 
 I used the FontAwesome hand-paper icon as part of the logo for this project. I use the icons hand-paper and question-circle in their regular and/or solid form in different parts of the app too. I modified hand-paper, including changing its color. For the app's icon I added a graphical element in the middle.
